ygData.subject: Re: Xegony
ygData.msgSnippet: Those 14th spells cost lots of money, i d almost suggest saving up for them, each one costing roughly 6pp, highest i think was a little over 7pp, i know i just
ygData.messageBody:
Those 14th spells cost lots of money, i'd almost suggest saving up for them,
each one costing roughly 6pp, highest i think was a little over 7pp, i know
i just made 14th and have been saving for quite some time.

Kyrus, 14th Holy Circle of Tunare, Erollisi Marr Server
----- Original Message -----
From: Walt Zimbeck <wzimbeck@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 1999 11:21 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Xegony


> From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>
>
> I agree with this for sure. Is there anyone on Erollisi Marr?
>
> Again I wish to thank all for the help I have gotten from this list.
After
> weeks of frustration in trying to make 11 in and around CB Yilari moved to
> Freeport temporarily. Well today she made 12 and has a lot of fun
killing
> orcs in EC and dervs in N. Ro. She has also had fun with the zombies and
> mummies at the ruins in EC and the occasional wisp that comes along. No
> luck finding a GSL though yet. Her only bad experience came when she was
> talked into venturing down into Oasis.
>
> I also understand what you all have been saying about being helpful and
> people will notice. Yilari has ran all over EC healing and curing disease
> etc when people call out for aid. Today someone came up to her and gave
her
> a chain tunic. Now she is looking to either give away or sell her
leather
> one.
>
> I am wondering about weapons now. She currently uses either cracked
staff
> or summoned hammer. She cannot afford one of the really nice weapons yet
> but what should she be looking for? Remember that she barely has 11pp in
> the bank and has to be able to afford 14th level spells soon also.
>
> Thanks all,
> Yilari, High Elven Cleric of Tunare, Erollsi Marr
>
>
>
> > From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
> >
> >
> > How many ppl do we have out there on the Xegony Server??...would be nice
> to
> > get together and kinda help each other out...occasionally...
> >
> > Sianne 28th
> > Xegony
> >
> > >
>
> >
